author: Cyrus Farivar
title: In California, protective equipment shortage pushes nurses to consider drastic action
description: Nationwide shortages of hospital supplies are causing tension between health care workers and hospital systems.
content:
OAKLAND, Calif. A group of bandana-clad nurses protested outside Kaiser Permanente's Oakland Medical Center on Monday night with a message: "We need PPE."
On Tuesday evening, a similar group of Kaiser nurses rallied in the rain while maintaining recommended … [+8433 chars]
